mapper.select: select s.shop_idx,s.shop_name,s.address,se.sector_content,s.holiday,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.business_status, (select count(*) from shop_review sr where s.shop_idx = sr.shop_idx) as review_count, (select count(*) from member_and_shop mms where s.shop_idx = mms.shop_idx) as bookmark_count from member_and_shop ms inner join shop s on ms.shop_idx = s.shop_idx inner join sector se on s.sector_id = se.sector_id where ms.member_id = ${memberId}

select s.shop_idx,s.shop_name,s.address,se.sector_content,s.holiday,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.business_status, (select count(*) from shop_review sr where s.shop_idx = sr.shop_idx) as review_count, (select count(*) from member_and_shop mms where s.shop_idx = mms.shop_idx) as bookmark_count from shop_review r inner join shop s on r.shop_idx = s.shop_idx inner join sector se on s.sector_id = se.sector_id where r.member_id = ${memberId}
select frequent_question_category_id,content from frequent_question_category

select f.title,f.content,fc.content as category_content from frequent_question f inner join frequent_question_category fc on f.frequent_question_category_id = fc.frequent_question_category_id where f.frequent_question_id = ${frequentQuestionId}
select notice_id,title,date_format(regdate,"%Y-%m-%d") as regdate from notice
select n.title,n.content,date_format(n.regdate,"%Y-%m-%d") as regdate,i.name from notice n left join notice_image i on n.notice_id = i.notice_id where n.notice_id = ${noticeId}
select m.profile_image,m.name,d.area_name from member m inner join area_dong d on m.id = d.id where member_id = ${memberId}
select question_category_id,content from question_category

select q.question_content,qc.content,q.answer_status,date_format(q.regdate,"%Y-%m-%d") as regdate from question q inner join question_category qc on q.question_category_id = qc.question_category_id where q.member_id = ${memberId}

select f.frequent_question_id,f.title from frequent_question f inner join frequent_question_category fc on f.frequent_question_category_id = fc.frequent_question_category_id where f.frequent_question_category_id = ${id}

select fc.content as cateContent,f.title,f.content from frequent_question f inner join frequent_question_category fc on f.frequent_question_category_id = fc.frequent_question_category_id where f.frequent_question_id = ${id}
select with_category_id,with_content from with_category
select distinct id,area_name from area_dong where LEFT(zip_code,2) = #{zipCode} GROUP BY area_name
select s.shop_idx,s.main_image,s.shop_name,d.area_name from shop s inner join area_dong d on s.id = d.id where member_id = ${memberId}
select s.main_image,s.shop_name,s.id from shop s inner join area_dong d on s.id = d.id where shop_idx = ${shopIdx}
